participant_1.background:
I spend too much time playing with my cat, Leroy Jenkins.
my lifes passion is designer french fries.
My father doesn't approve of my music.
I am a cat lover who enjoys making organic cat food for my furry friend.
I bought a card for my first crush on Valentine's Day.

participant_2.background:
I'm a teacher and I'm looking for a way to satisfy my hunger so that I can continue teaching my students.
I now enjoy gardening and cooking with my favorite ingredients.
i work as a personal trainer , 5 days a week.
I like to share my time and company with others.
I don't have any kids, but I'm close to my family.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
Hello there! It's going great! How about yours?
My day is going well. I am just enjoying some time with my cat, Leroy Jenkins.
Cats are wonderful pets. I have one of my own. What's your favorite thing to do with Leroy?
I love to play with him and make him organic cat food. He loves the food I make for him.
That's great! I'm glad he enjoys the food you make for him. I love gardening and cooking with my favorite ingredients.
That sounds like a fun hobby. I love to cook as well. I'm not as good at gardening, but I enjoy it.
It's a lot of work, but it's worth it when you get to enjoy the fruits of your labor. What kind of music do you like?
I like a variety of music, but my favorite is rock music. What about you?
I like a lot of different music too, but my favorite is country music.
I love country music too! I'm a big fan of Luke Bryan.
He's a great artist! I'm also a fan of Eric Church.
I love Eric Church too! He's a great performer.
He is! I've seen him in concert a few times and he always puts on a great show.
I've never seen him in concert, but I'd love to someday
